author: chfast
content: <@360491619402776577> evmone has some EOF validation unit tests with hand-written bytecodes: https://github.com/ethereum/evmone/blob/master/test/unittests/eof_validation_test.cpp

author: _shemnon
content: <@360491619402776577> Here are the validation tests Besu is running against: https://github.com/ethereum/tests/tree/develop/EOFTests, in particular efValidation and efStack.  I'm researching some issues in the EIP4200, EIP4750, EIP5450, and efExample directories.  At some point some of them were against the old spec so I had excluded them.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: I stumbled upon the 0x80 non-returning special case for section 0. In our code it was not allowed to have outputs > 127, looks like this changed from the shanghai spec to now, just fyi for anyone implementing

author: _shemnon
content: Yea, I had to re-write all my tests for that change, at least to change the type data in section zero for all hand built EOF cases I had.
